thread.title: Arsenal to win

title: Arsenal to win
text:
On Saturday (18/01/2025), Arsenal will look to keep the pressure on Liverpool as they take on Aston Villa. Below, we’ve compiled some Bet Builder Tips ahead of the game.
NEW CUSTOMERS ONLY. FIRST SINGLE & E/W BET ONLY. ODDS OF 1/1 OR GREATER. 4 X £10 BET TOKENS. FREE BET STAKES NOT INCLUDED IN RETURNS. FREE BETS ARE NON WITHDRAWABLE. FREE BETS EXPIRE AFTER 30 DAYS. ELIGIBILITY RESTRICTIONS AND FURTHER T&CS APPLY. 18+. GAMBLEAWARE.ORG. 18+.
On Saturday (18/01/2025), Arsenal will look to keep the pressure on Liverpool as they take on Aston Villa. Below, we’ve compiled some Bet Builder Tips ahead of the game.
BuildABet: Arsenal to win, Leandro Trossard to score, Amadou Onana to be carded, Thomas Partey to be carded. - 20/1
Arsenal are unbeaten at home this season with seven wins and three draws from ten games.
Leandro Trossard has scored in his most recent appearance against Tottenham Hotspur and is expected to start at the weekend.
Amadou Onana has received four yellow cards this season and has committed 1.5 fouls per game.
Thomas Partey has received two yellow cards this season and has committed 1.3 fouls per game.
BuildABet: Arsenal to win, 6+ corners - Arsenal, Leandro Trossard to score, Kai Havertz to commit a foul. -9/2
Arsenal are unbeaten at home this season with seven wins and three draws from ten games.
Leandro Trossard has scored in his most recent appearance against Tottenham Hotspur and is expected to start at the weekend.
Arsenal have averaged 6.4 corners per game this season.
Kai Havertz has committed 1.8 fouls per game this season.
